heading_level_1: BugBuster Without Slowing – Tackling Development Defect Backlogs
section: BugBuster Without Slowing – Tackling Development Defect Backlogs

text:
The Challenge

Growing Defect Pile-Up

Defect backlogs grow while development sprints continue.

Manual Processes Drain Productivity High defect leakage into production increases costs and customer dissatisfaction.

Delivery Delays from Legacy Issues Feature delivery often gets delayed due to old unresolved bugs.

Impact of Defect Leakage Manual defect resolution and validation consumes valuable engineering time.

Moolya's Solution – BugBuster

Focused Backlog Resolution

Dedicated engineering teams focusing solely on backlog clearance.

Dual-Track Execution – backlog fixes while

Parallel execution

development sprints continue.

Automation-Led Validation

Automation-first validation of bug fixes with minimal manual intervention.

Preventive Quality Insights

Root cause analysis to prevent recurring defects and reduce future backlog.

Business Impact

Lower Production Defects

Reduced defect leakage to production by 20%-40%.

Rapid Backlog Impact – up

Accelerated backlog clearance to 50% reduction within 3 months.

Cleaner, Faster Releases

Faster release readiness with

cleaner builds.

Happier End Users

Increased customer satisfaction with

stable releases.

Developer Productivity Boost

Improved developer focus on new features, boosting productivity.

Why Moolya?

Proven expertise in QA and engineering for complex systems.

Hybrid approach combining engineering, automation, and testing.

Seamless integration with your existing tools

(Jira, Jenkins, GitHub).

Data-driven defect analysis and prioritization.

Thank You!
